content: Enzo Clinical Services revenue reached $23.7 million, an increase of 20% from the first quarter of fiscal 2022 and in line with that $24 million in the year ago period. On the divisional basis, clinical services revenue for the second quarter was $23.7 million, an increase of 20% sequentially, compared to $19.7 million in the first quarter of fiscal year 2022 and a slight decrease from the $24 million in the second quarter of 2021.
